wikipedia_page.main: Clifford Burton (15 June 1931 – 20 May 1978) was an English cricketer active from 1956 to 1957 who played for Lancashire. He was born in Manchester and died in Oldham. He appeared in two first-class matches, scoring no runs, and held two catches.

response: Clifford Burton is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s. He played at club level for Castleford (Heritage № 380).David Smart & Andrew Howard (1 July 2000) "Images of Sport - Castleford Rugby League - A Twentieth Century History". The History Press Ltd.
*Clifford Burton Memory Box Search at archive.castigersheritage.com
